{{multiple issues| {{No footnotes|date=January 2011}} {{BLP IMDb refimprove|only=yes|date=January 2011}} }}
[[File:Karl Dall, ROMY 2009 a.jpg|thumb|Karl Dall (2009)]] '''Karl Bernhard Dall''' (born 1 February 1941 in [[Emden]], [[Germany]]) is a [[Germany|German]] comedian, singer and television presenter. His distinctive 'hanging' eye is caused by an inborn [[Ptosis (eyelid)|Ptosis]].
== Family == Karl Dall is the son of a [[rector (academia)|school rector]] and a [[teacher]]. He married his wife Barbara in 1971. They have one daughter, Janina who works as a [[stunt performer|stuntwoman]] in [[Canada]]. Karl Dall has two sisters and a brother. He lives in [[Hamburg-Eppendorf]].
== Career == Karl Dall left school after the 10th grade and accomplished an apprenticeship as a typesetter in a print shop in the town of [[Leer]], [[East Frisia]].
Together with Ingo Insterburg, Jürgen Barz and Peter Ehlebracht he founded in 1967 the comedy group ''{{Interlanguage link multi|Insterburg & Co.|de}}'' of which he was a member until it ceased to exist in the 1970s. Moreover, he created the TV show ''[[Musikladen]]'' for [[Radio Bremen]] and has since then been working for television broadcasters.
From 1983 until 1990 he used to appear in the hidden camera [[Television comedy|comedy show]] ''Verstehen Sie Spaß?'', playing for example a chaotic film presenter or a telephone prankster.
In the German radio broadcast of [[RTL Radio|Radio Luxemburg]] (RTL) he presented his own comedy show and was also among the first TV-presenters of television channel [[RTL Television|RTLplus]]. There he had his own talkshow named ''Dall-As'' which was aired from 19 January 1985 until the end of 1991. The concept was to irritate and provoke the guests. On 4 January 1992 he continued this show at the rivalling television channel [[Sat.1]] as ''Jux und Dallerei''.
From 1991 until 1993 he presented the game show ''Koffer Hoffer'' on television channel [[Tele 5]]. In this show lost luggage, of which the owner could not be identified anymore, was auctioned to the candidates. Later he was member of the initial ensemble of the comedy show ''[[7 Tage, 7 Köpfe]]''. The spontaneous Karl Dall left the show after a few years due to differences of opinion with [[Rudi Carrell]] who always scheduled his shows meticulously.
In September 2006 his [[autobiography]] titled ''Auge zu und durch'' (Eye shut and through) was published.
== Movies == * 1963: ''[[Apache Gold]]'' * 1964: ''[[Freddy in the Wild West]]'' * 1967: ''[[ Hotel Clausewitz ]]'' * 1968: ''{{Interlanguage link multi|Quartett im Bett|de}}'' * 1969: ''[[Charley's Uncle]]'' * 1970: ''[[Student of the Bedroom]]'' * 1970: ''Hänsel und Gretel verliefen sich im Wald'' * 1974: ''{{Interlanguage link multi|Chapeau Claque|de|3=Chapeau Claque (Film)}}'' * 1980: ''{{Interlanguage link multi|Panische Zeiten (film)|de|3=Panische Zeiten|lt=Panische Zeiten}}'' * 1983: ''[[Gib Gas – Ich will Spass (1983 film)|Gib Gas – Ich will Spass (de)]]'' * 1983: ''{{Interlanguage link multi|Das verrückte Strandhotel|de}}'' a.k.a. ''Dirndljagd am Kilimandscharo'' * 1983: ''[[Sunshine Reggae auf Ibiza]]'' * 1984: ''Ein irres Feeling'' * 1985: ''Drei und eine halbe Portion'' * 1988: ''[[Starke Zeiten]]'' * 1989: ''{{Interlanguage link multi|Die Senkrechtstarter|de}}'' * 1999: ''{{Interlanguage link multi|Hans im Glück (1999 film)|de|3=Hans im Glück (1999)|lt=Hans im Glück}}'' * 2001: ''König der Winde'' (Short) * 2003: ''{{Interlanguage link multi|Suche impotenten Mann fürs Leben|de}}'' * 2006: ''Rotkäppchen – Wege zum Glück'' (TV film) * 2008: ''{{Interlanguage link multi|African Race – Die verrückte Jagd nach dem Marakunda|de}}'' (TV film)
== Awards == * 1994: [[Preis der beleidigten Zuschauer]] (literally "Award of the offended viewers") ([[:de:Preis der beleidigten Zuschauer|Link to article on German-language Wikipedia]]) * 1999: [[Deutscher Comedypreis]] ''Ehrenpreis für sein Lebenswerk'' (honorary award for his lifetime achievements)
== External links == * {{IMDb name|0197983}} * [http://www.karldall.de/ Homepage von Karl Dall] * [https://web.archive.org/web/20110424214358/http://www.kulturinitiative.de/dall/ Biographie] * [http://www.tini24.de/index.php?site=regionales_details&objekt_ID=40 Interview mit Karl Dall] * {{DNB-Portal|132109352}}
